content: *quick to crochet this bag is great as a purse or to use as a beach tote or market bag lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 30107 *ckc-easybag pdf* skill level easy level 2 lion® cotton article #760 2 balls crochet hook - size h-8 5 mm bag is worked with double_crochet worked into the space between two double_crochet stitches rather than in each double_crochet stitch bag is constructed from the bottom up two handles are worked separately then sewn together to finish similar patterns in different sizes 4 ball market bag #l20065 1 29 in 73 5 cm circumference at widest point market tote bag #515 2 43½ in 110 cm around at widest point 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/4-ball-market-bag 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/market-tote-bag-515
